CustomField.description: This field is used to indicate that an Activity Line Item record should be cancelled. This field was originally created for the Contracts Team to indicate which Activity Line Items should be cancelled when processing Opportunities.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: This field is used to indicate that an Activity Line Item record should be cancelled. This field was originally created for the Contracts Team to indicate which Activity Line Items should be cancelled when processing Opportunities.
CustomField.label: Flagged For Cancellation
